getMaxNumPuts

public int getMaxNumPuts()
Description copied from interface: CDField
Get the maximum number of puts since the last clearNumPuts. This is the maximum number of puts to any particular element of the associated PVField. If PVField is a scalar or an array of scalars then this is the same as numPuts.

Specified by:
getMaxNumPuts in interface CDField
Returns:
The maximum number.
